content: this pattern has been a favorite since it was published on gail bable s website since it is no longer available there it is now in the ravelry database it s been a favorite baby gift over and over my one granddaughter has it in multiple sizes because she s always loved it it can be a smaller preemie or doll blanket or it can be a larger one to wrap baby **this pattern has been updated as of 16 jul 2019 ** the basic pattern has the last row added to the instructions so the edgings match plus tips for finding your way in the lace pattern please be sure to update in your ravelry library
